entries.desc: Base implementation class for interruptible channels.
entries.name: AbstractInterruptibleChannel

entries.desc: Base implementation class for selectable channels.
entries.name: AbstractSelectableChannel

entries.desc: Base implementation class for selection keys.
entries.name: AbstractSelectionKey

entries.desc: Service-provider class for selectors and selectable channels.
entries.name: SelectorProvider

desc: Service-provider classes for the java.nio.channels package.  Only developers who are defining new selector providers or asynchronous channel providers should need to make direct use of this package.  Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in any class or interface in this package will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.
